verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:17
verses.text: Therefore I hated life; because the work that is wrought under the sun is grievous unto me: for all is vanity and vexation of spirit.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:18
verses.text: Yea, I hated all my labour which I had taken under the sun: because I should leave it unto the man that shall be after me.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:19
verses.text: And who knoweth whether he shall be a wise man or a fool? yet shall he have rule over all my labour wherein I have laboured, and wherein I have shewed myself wise under the sun. This is also vanity.
